actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-974.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 3060 passed with similar provisions.

official_title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to provide a 1-year extension for the preparation of the report of the National Study Commission on Records and Documents of Federal Officials.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-974) Provides a one-year extension for the preparation of the report of the National Study Commission on Records and Documents of Federal Officials. Provides for the appointment by the Chief Justice of the United States of one member of the Federal judiciary to the Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to provide a 1-year extension for the preparation of the report of the National Study Commission on Records and Documents of Federal Officials.
